meanings.definition: To remove or erase something from a computer or other storage device.
meanings.sent1: She deletes old files to make space.
meanings.sent2: He deletes unnecessary emails every day.
meanings.sent3: The computer deletes files faster than she can blink.
meanings.sent4: His swift hand deletes the mistake from the screen.
meanings.sent5: Pressing the delete key erases the text instantly.

meanings.definition: To eliminate or get rid of something.
meanings.sent1: The maid deletes dust from every corner.
meanings.sent2: They delete unhealthy snacks from their diet.
meanings.sent3: The magic eraser deletes stains like a charm.
meanings.sent4: Time deletes memories we wish to forget.
meanings.sent5: Deleting negativity brings peace of mind.

meanings.definition: To cancel or remove a record or entry.
meanings.sent1: She deletes incorrect entries from the database.
meanings.sent2: He deletes his name from the list.
meanings.sent3: The delete button saves the day by removing errors.
meanings.sent4: Deleting the message erases any trace of it.
meanings.sent5: The delete function is a lifesaver for mistakes.
